TLS mapping of Devil's Cave

Shooting lasers at speleothems

Posted on July 10, 2018

On July 08-09-10 we had a great field trip to the Devil’s Cave. The goal of this trip was to collect Terrestrial LiDAR (TLS) data of the touristic sector of the cave. [Read More]

"Garcia Garden" quarry

3D modeling of a vertical wall with SfM and a UAV

Posted on April 24, 2018

On March 28th and April 3rd we had two nice field trips to the “Garcia Garden” quarry. The goal was to acquire images with our drone to create a 3D model of the wall. The model will be used by Camila and Fernanda to determine the attitude (dip direction, dip)... [Read More]
Tags: wall sfm quarry vertical litchi

We finally have a website!

Posted on January 4, 2018

Thanks to Dean Attali, SPALab now has a website. This is still an early draft, and more sections and material will be added over the weeks to come. Thanks are extended to RECON (The R Epidemics Consortium), since their site was used as an example to set up this one.... [Read More]
